question: Which of the following is correct about electrolytic refining?
option1: Strip of pure metal is used as anode
option2: Strip of pure metal is used as cathode
option3: Copper cannot be refined using an electrolytic method
answer: Strip of pure metal is used as cathode
explanation: In electrolytic refining, the impure metal is made to act as anode. A strip of the same metal in pure form is used as cathode. Copper is generally refined using an electrolytic method.
